abstract: Visa has two big challenges ahead. The first is its plan for what is expected to be an $18 billion initial public offering, which would be the biggest ever in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Visa has two big challenges ahead. The first is its plan for what is expected to be an $18 billion initial public offering, which would be the biggest ever in the United States.

headline.main: Visa I.P.O. Could Be Boon for Lawyers, Too
